hadiths.text: Jabir bin ‘Abd Allaah reported the Apostle of Allaah(ﷺ) as saying “Do not send out your beasts when the sun has set till the darkness of the night prevails, for the devils grope about in the dark when the sun has set till the darkness of the night prevails.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَرَاهِيَةِ السَّيْرِ فِي أَوَّلِ اللَّيْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Disapproval Of Traveling At The Beginning Of The Night
